name.en: Dead Line the Mad Fiend of Despair
name.ja: <ruby>絶<rt>ぜつ</rt></ruby><ruby>望<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby><ruby>狂<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>デッド・ライン

requirement.en: Send this face-up card from your field to the Graveyard during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Dead End the Mad Fiend of Despair" from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
